rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to welcome sunlight and a bohemian decor theme.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living room designed in a Bohemian style with ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows facing the south-west direction. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning seating areas towards the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Cozy dining area adjacent to the living room with natural light and a view. The space maintains balance as per Vastu by avoiding sharp angles in seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen equipped with efficient appliances and ample storage; includes a small prep area with indirect sunlight to respect Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed guest bedroom featuring ambient lighting and access to the terrace. Designed with natural materials and textures to embrace a Bohemian aesthetic while adhering to Vastu by aligning doorways in an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with a private balcony facing east, ensuring positive energy flow according to Vastu. The room features bohemian decor elements and floor-to-ceiling windows for an expansive view.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym space equipped with modern fitness gear, featuring ample natural light through high windows to boost energy levels. Designed with a relaxed Bohemian touch and following Vastu principles by placing equipment in the northeast corner.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A state-of-the-art home theater designed for immersive viewing experiences. The layout follows Bohemian design elements and ensures acoustics are optimized by aligning seating towards the center.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed washroom with functional fixtures. The design includes natural light through frosted windows and adheres to Vastu guidelines by ensuring proper placement of water elements.

openings.description: Large, floor-to-ceiling windows installed in living room, master bedroom, and guest bedroom to maximize natural light while maintaining privacy with adjustable curtains.
Stately entrance door designed for both security and aesthetic appeal, positioned according to Vastu guidelines.
